candidates.title: Replace Travis with Github Actions
candidates.body:
Github Actions is the preferred CI in the rust ecosystem nowadays,
especially after Travis has been acquired by Idera, a company known to
neglect their portfolio.

candidates.title: We are asynchronous now
Clean-up the errors
Make Builder::message take self by mut reference
candidates.body: This changes the API to take `Self` by `&mut` reference. Practice has shown that the by-value `Self` is very unwieldy in this particular case, because any error that arises from the `message` method will consume both the builder and the messages built this far. While that could be rectified by returning `Self` in `Err` case, taking a `&mut` is a significantly more elegant solution.

candidates.title: Rework the API to allow message batching
Add Clippy and don't use trivial refs

repo.name: hedwig-rust
repo.description: Message bus for micro-services that works on AWS and GCP
